lines.text: Will you stop harassing me? I know who you are, you're a rock person of some sort.
Do you like my music?
No, I don't like your music.
Why?
It's bubblegum!
Yeah? Well 21 million Americans seem to think different!
Well, bully for them!
*Bully* for them? What kind of word is "bully"? What kind of music do you like?
Tony Bennett.
Jesus...
No... Tony Bennett!

[trying to wake up Jamie and get him to leave after sleeping with him]
James... time for you to go!

[waking up sleepily]
What? Are you serious? I can't believe you're doing this...
Oh, and you've never asked anyone to leave, right?
We just made love!
No we didn't... we just had sex!

[after crashing into Diana's car, he gets out to help]
Oh, I'm sorry! That was my fault!
No shit!
This just hasn't been my day.
Sure as hell hasn't been mine!
I feel terrible about this, look I'll be glad to buy you another car.
Your insurance information will be sufficient.
